nosotros.quienes_somos_texto: We are a translation and interpreting company dedicated to providing linguistic services and crossing communication and cultural barriers. We focus on being the link that facilitates understanding and collaboration in a globalized world, where the human factor is fundamental.
nosotros.nuestro_enfoque_texto: Our vision is to encourage the recognition and appreciation of the translator's and interpreterÂ´s work in society, thus contributing to the development of an interconnected world.
nosotros.valores_y_compromisos_texto: In our company, we are guided by fundamental values: quality, responsibility and confidentiality. We are committed to providing high quality language services, respecting the agreed deadlines and protecting the confidentiality of our clients' information. In addition, we constantly pursue excellence and improvement in all our operations.

servicios.traduccion_desciption: We provide translation services (English<>Spanish) of any kind of texts in the area you need, such as: certified translations, legal translations, medical translations, literary translations, degree translations, image translations, audiovisual translations, among others.
servicios.interpretacion_desciption: We provide interpreting services (English<>Spanish and Creole<>Spanish) of any kind in the area you need, such as: remote interpreting (VRI), conference interpreting, simultaneous interpreting, consecutive interpreting, telephone interpreting (OPI), among others.
servicios.correccion_y_edicion_desciption: We provide correction, revision and editing services (English<>Spanish) of any kind in the area you need, such as: translations made with automatic translators, translations made with artificial intelligence, translations with errors, among others.
servicios.transcripcion_desciption: We provide transcription services (English and Spanish) of any kind in the area you need, such as: transcriptions of educational videos, audio transcriptions, transcriptions for subtitles, among others.

proceso.descripcion_1: Send us your document or contact us through our e-mail thotranslations@gmail.com.
proceso.title_2: We will send you your quotation
proceso.descripcion_2: We will respond to your email with a quote for your service.
proceso.descripcion_3: Once the quotation is accepted, we confirm the service and payment methods.

contacto.mensaje_no_enviado_text_default: Unexpected problem occurred, try again later
contacto.mensaje_no_enviado_text_solicitudes: Too many requests, please wait a while
